si.t: Mandatory if: - Notification Type is Engineering Requirement. - Required End Rationale is filled.
Mandatory if Required End Date is filled.
Will be defaulted if left blank, based on Functional Location
Mandatory if Task List is filled

Mandatory if: - Notification Type is Engineering Requirement or - Notification Type is Investigation or - Subsequent Work Request from Engineering Requirement.
Else, leave blank.
Will be defaulted if left blank, based on Linear Functional Location
Optional, populate only for Linear Functional Location
